author: mcombellack
msg: Updated the code so that a shared instance of Random() is used to generate the random numbers as this is more efficient and improves the quality of the random numbers (FindBugs reported issue)

author: pamarcelot
msg: Added an Authentication Page to the Server Configuration Editor where the user can edit the supported mechanisms and all the SASL settings.

author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-1937: Website page incorrecly lists Derby versioning (in one spot) as Minor.major.
Swapped the position of the two words.

author: jacopoc
msg: Misc fixes and cleanups to let the returns work properly even with order items with null itemDescriptions
